entities.description: The type of substance use (alcohol, drugs, both) indicated in support group participation.
Indicates whether the respondent participated in a support group in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent received outpatient treatment for alcohol use in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent received outpatient treatment for marijuana use in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Specifies the type of substance use (alcohol, drugs, both) involved in the support group participation.
Links the respondent to their receipt of outpatient treatment for alcohol use in the past 12 months.
Links the respondent to their receipt of outpatient treatment for marijuana use in the past 12 months.
